snippet: Mr. Saxton was a writer ostracized as a Communist, who went on to become a prominent cultural historian, transforming his life in his 40s.
abstract: Alexander Saxton, novelist and historian, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Saxton was a writer ostracized as a Communist, who went on to become a prominent cultural historian, transforming his life in his 40s.

headline.seo: Alexander Saxton, Historian and Novelist, Is Dead at 93
headline.main: Alexander Saxton, Historian and Novelist, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Alexander Saxton, Novelist and Historian, Dies at 93
